title: Report Suspected Child Abuse or Neglect
description: A citizen is calling a hotline to make a report of suspected child abuse.

tasks.description: Handle the call with empathy and professionalism, assuring the caller of confidentiality if requested.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent creates a safe environment for the caller to make a report.

tasks.description: Gather all pertinent information about the child, the alleged perpetrator, and the nature of the suspected abuse or neglect.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent carefully documents all details provided by the caller.

tasks.description: Create a formal report in the child protective services system for immediate review and assignment to an investigator.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent successfully logs the report, triggering an urgent response.
